SliderpostList.posttitle: Balagot & Emperado CPAs Co. Expands with the Opening of Samal Branch
SliderpostList.DescriptionLine1: Island Garden City of Samal, August 8, 2025 — Growth, gratitude, and new beginnings marked the day as Balagot & Emperado CPAs Co. (BECC) officially opened and blessed its newest branch in the picturesque Island Garden City of Samal.
SliderpostList.DescriptionLine2: The celebration began with a solemn blessing led by Rev. Fr. Fernando Cabilan Jr., FFM, filling the morning with heartfelt prayers and a sense of shared hope for the future. The occasion was graced by clients, partners, friends, and members of the BECC family, all of whom brought their warmth, support, and joy to the milestone event.
SliderpostList.DescriptionLine4: The opening of the Samal branch is a significant step in BECC’s mission to bring trusted professional services closer to communities, while expanding its reach both locally and internationally. With this new office, BECC is not only investing in infrastructure but also strengthening its commitment to providing quality, client-focused, and globally competitive services.
SliderpostList.DescriptionLine6: “This is more than just an office opening,” shared the BECC leadership team. “It is a symbol of our growth, our resilience, and our dedication to serving clients with excellence—whether here in Samal or across the globe.”
SliderpostList.DescriptionLine7: As the company looks ahead, the Samal branch stands as a testament to BECC’s continuous journey of expansion, innovation, and service excellence.
SliderpostList.author: by admin
